TV NATION: Tisch School of the Arts at NYU                           Skip to content        Undergraduate Film & Television Admissions About the Program Course Offerings Summer Courses Showcase Internships Facilities Special Projects First Run & Festivals Calendar of Events News TSOA FTV Wiki Admin & Faculty Alumni Blog Facebook Twitter YouTube  home > Undergraduate Film & TV        TV Nation: Inside and Out of the Box  FMTV-UT.1086 Studio 3 Credits Film and Television Majors register for H56.1086.01    Non-Majors register for H56.1086.02    Graduate-level students register for H56.2086.01    TV NATION: INSIDE AND OUT OF THE BOX gives students the opportunity to experience first hand how the world of network television works from two points of view: business and creative. Under the business umbrella are network programmers. Under the creative umbrella are writers, producers and casting directors. In TV NATION, students will role-play the key players who put together a season for the 8 major networks.
